name: QBQ Internal Testing
description:
Description

This game is based of the totally real horrors of working in a parcel depo. You work for QBQ, Not delivery experts. The welcome message reads: Welcome to the first day or the rest of your life, we hope there isn't any another workplace accidents and you enjoy your minimum wage pay. And remember... Smile More!

Controls

W A S D - Movement

LMB - Pick Up Box

E - Open Door

LMB (Hold) - Charge and throw box

RMB - Drop Box

Developers

MuffinCrumbs09 (YouTube - Github- BitBucket- Itch.io)

  • Programmer
  • Modeller

Futo (YouTube - Itch.io)

  • Modeller
  • Voice Actor
  • Trailer

GameJam

This game was made in 48 hours as apart of the Novice Summer Jam Series game jam with the theme: "What's in this box". 

Source Code found on BitBucket
